We shall appreciate your kind understanding.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: I took my family to visit Knott’s Berry Farm and we travels roughly about 3 1/2 hours away. Since we were near the area of the hotel we wanted to maybe check in early and drop off our things. I know it states check in time was at 3pm. We got there at about 12:30 but the concierge stated we have to wait until after 3pm. They didn’t bother to see if by chance there was a room that was available. So we took our kids to the Theme Park and returned back later that evening. But other than that the hotel room and stay was good.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your comments. I’m sorry that unfortunate circumstance make your experience with us a bad one. We take real pride in our hotel and regret that we let you down in this case. We’re taking action to make the hotel better and we are also making staffing improvements. If you give us another chance, we’ll do better for you next time.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager

Summary: It was clean, it looks like they have updated room interiors,  the staff were pleasant, the breakfast was typical cereal & cook your own waffles... It was worth the cost and I have already booked it again for the next visit to the area
Manager Response: Hello Melissa,  It is really incredible to see your positive feedback. Our team is very much delighted with your appreciation. Glad to see that you very much liked the location and the stay. We eagerly await you to welcoming you again.  Regards,	 Hotel Manager. Howard Johnson by Wyndham Buena Park.

Summary: Our first visit. Comfortable, clean. Staff helpful. Very good position.Old style Motel, 2 storey. Stairs a problem for me, being a Senior Citizen.  Newspapers available.Continental breakfast adequate. Could be a little later, say 10am finish.
Manager Response: Hello Val,  Thanks for staying at the Howard Johnson Buena Park. We can very well understand your generosity in appreciating the positives and also  areas where you found the need for improvement. We will definitely act on them and make your next visit a totally satisfactory one. Hope you will visit back at the earliest.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: Older property with remodel, quiet and clean comfortable room with mini fridge and microwave, wood laminate flooring. Staff is friendly. Rates aren't the lowest to similar hotels but not the highest either.
Manager Response: Hello Micheal,  Thank you for the stay and great feedback. We are sure you enjoyed our accommodation and services.  We are privileged to host guests like you. Look forward to welcoming you for another awesome stay.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: Great swift check in no problems room clean comfortable bed, We arrived late feeling hungry we asked the night for some where to get food he had to google told us mc d nearby    He told us to drive as we got to end of  car park we saw it was across the road can only think area not safe to walk.
Manager Response: Hello Guest,   Thanks for the stay and the feedback. We shall definitely work on your observations. You can expect a further improved stay next time. Visit us again soon.   Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: It's in a safe area, it's clean. No weirdos in parking lots. They offer a great breakfast! They have laundry facilities as well. The rooms are large & comfortable. I will definitely be back. Jay & Anika in the front office are very friendly & helpful. Thank you for having great customer service!
Manager Response: Hello Neblina,  Thanks for your stay at the Howard Johnson by Wyndham Buena Park. We are delighted to see your feedback. Your appreciation is very much encouraging. Our team will offer yet another awesome hospitality next time. Looking forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: We drove up from San Diego and stayed on a Sunday night prior to a Long Beach Carnival Cruise.  The site is about 20 miles and 20 - 30 minutes away from the terminal. We included dinner at Knotts Berry Farm located 5 minutes away. Very relaxing way to deal with heavy SoCal traffic.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are glad that you had a great experience with us. Thank you for your generous compliments about us. We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed the many amenities offered at our location and had an amazing time during your stay. We hope to serve you again in the future.   Sincerely Hotel Manager

Summary: The first time I booked at this hotel, the room I stayed was as nice as the ones on their website and Bookings.com.  So, I decided to book again on my following trip to the area hoping for the same experience. However, I was very disappointed to find that the room I was given was quite the opposite of my first stay.   In fact, it looked like it was 15-20 years older. If you decide to stay at this hotel, make sure you specify that you want a room like the pictures on their website or Bookings.com or you will be very disappointed.   Another major issue the second time around is the very slow Internet connection. It felt like dial-up.

Summary Heading: Good Location not so good room
Summary: Close to many things so location great but beds were hard, towles felt like sand paper because they were so rough, don't get a downstairs room because you hear the upstairs, our bathtube felt like it was sinking in and wobbly, and breakfast was pretty basic nothing special. Rooms were a good size overall. Staff and housekeepers were awesome very nice! If your there to just sleep and save money I would recommend but if you want a comfy place I would say go somewhere worth your money.

The king bed was awesome the breakfast was crap but everyone was friendly and I enjoyed my stay, they dont have an elevator so getting up to the second floor with all your luggage can be a challenge if you have a lot of stuff

Nothing wrong (other than some noisy neighbors)' but nothing memorable either. The air conditioner was older and a bit noisy. Front desk personnel were straightforward about business (and a bit cold), but warmed up and became friendlier once they figured out that (I) was friendly and happy to make their job easier were I could.

I am handicapped and travel with my son several times a year.  We have stayed here a couple of times and have recommended it to other family members.  We are already planning our next visit.  We have also stayed at Wyndhams in Northern California.

My sister and I recently took a two day trip to Disneyland (which was awesome). I used the HotelTonight app to book this hotel not realizing it was the one in Buena Park not Anaheim. This place is awful! The room was not clean, everything felt dirty...everything. The furniture is old and stained/scratched. There was some kind of chemical burn on the headboard of the bed. I didn’t walk on the carpet without sandals. The bed was super uncomfortable. I barely slept at all. We were on the first floor near the bbq area. There were some people above us who sounded like their kids were running across the room back and forth all night. Lots of noise from people hanging out near the bbq area/walking by late at night making lots of noise to get to their room. The shower was fine until the

The sheets on our bed were not changed, there was sand down the whole right side of the bed. There was a poorly patched hole in the wall they tried to hide with a chair. The shower was good, had good pressure. Website says they offer Disneyland service, but they don't.  The breakfast is only carb foods and the coffee carafe need cleaned.

We came in pretty late, it wasn't a problem! Room was very clean, outside appearance was very clean. Loved that there was grass along with tables and chairs outside.Breakfast was average but had plenty of seating area!

Hotel was very clean food was very fresh check-in and check-out was very easy. Location of the hotel was perfect. Parking was easy and rations where very flesh and clean. Breakfast room was very clean and the workers kept all the food replenished

Disappointing.  We had gone for our 25th wedding anniversary.. This was my first time ever staying at a Howard Johnson, and if they are all like this, it will be my one and only stay ever. Bed was so extremely hard and uncomfortable,  I wasn't able to enjoy our trip as well as planned because of the serious lack of sleep.  There was an outside BBQ area. We had thought about using that.  Then seen how nasty dirty the BBQ grill was and chose not to even mess with it.  You can tell they are fixing things up, but the stay was miserable.  Dont get me wrong,  the staff was nice and friendly.  However, the free continental breakfast, carb city! The only thing available was BREAD or make your own waffles, oh and some huge things of OLD and stale cereal, warm milk. No fruits or other

Was extremely disappointing  I would have stayed someplace else but was meeting friends  The picture on the wall in my room was hung upside down  The furniture looked like it was from a yard sale  Never again will I stay there
Manager Response: Lily F,  Sorry to hear our hotel didn't meet your expectations. We have updated some of our rooms recently with that room being one of them. Hopefully you will give our hotel another chance if your ever in the area.

Summary Heading: OK, but not one of the better Howard Johnsons
Summary: We had a very good experience with the Howard Johnson in Pasadena, but this one was a little disappointing. It wasn't as clean and didn't have as good of amenities. The breakfast was only bread and wait forever waffles. No yogurt or eggs.

This was my first time staying at a Howard Johnson. I reserved it thru Wyndham. Rooms looked updated, stayed from two nights, fresh towels for additional day a plus. The pool had a nice landscaping. The hotel was very clean. The only issues were that there where no accessible elevators, breakfast was dry, only bread and waffles available,  fruit or yogurt would have been nice. Also during check in I was billed a double deposit.

After staying from Monday to Friday at the Marriott in Long Beach.  This property was not at luxurious looking but it was nice and the rooms were bigger, the beds were bigger. and they actually had a bigger refrigerator and a microwave the the other didn't.  we stayed 2 nights very comfortably. and it was very close to Knott's berry Farm!

Continental breakfast is all the bread you can eat. No fruit, no options..bagel, white bread and two cereal choices. Oh and waffles,  did I mention BREAD?? Room in bad repair.  Value not worth it, sadly.

Summary Heading: Terrible customer service!  Deceiving! Stay away!
Summary: I booked an upgraded standard room in January for April 12 stay thru an agency.  I called them a month ahead to double check our booking was valid and the room type was upgraded room.  I reconfirmed it with the manager two days ahead.  Upon the date we supposed to check in, I called around 3 P.M. before we started to go, the front desk said our room was only a standard room.  Beside that is the only room they had.  I told them I confirmed with the manager, and they told me the manager only works there Monday to Thursday.  If we didn't like that only room, we could cancel the reservation thru the agency.  I told them it past the cancellation without penalty, that's why I called 2 days ahead to make sure everything is ok.  The front desk was irritated and hung up on me as she said

Too much crowded on weekends and is costly during weekends. Very less breakfast options. Room was spacious and average, but lobby was smelly. Ample amount of parking space but its in a deserted area (after 8) you won't be seeing anyone.

Could use more comfortable beds, you can hear your neighbors to the sides and above you talking and walking about. Didn't eat any of the breakfast cause it was all not in my regime, all simple carbohydrates and sugars.

The room was clean and there was someone at the front desk to help us check in. I don't know about their free breakfast because we got up late. But everything seem to be spot on. I would definitely recommend this to anyone. Just be cautious where you park because you may park at a tow area that doesn't belong to the hotel.

Not only was it dirty, there were bugs in the bed.  In the middle of my stay for the week, the power went out.  This place needs serious renovations.  When I had gone to the free breakfast, I was greeted with an angry look.  I didn't know this was someone that worked there until I saw them sitting behind the front desk ask we were leaving.

Summary Heading: If you care for cleanliness and buffet breakfast, avoid!
Summary: The advert had buffet breakfast, the sign said continental. The room had crumbs in our bed (found upon check out in the extra bed we had). No coffee machine like the photos on the website. If you like good coffee,(even that Flavia machine in the photo is decent), then this is not the hotel for you.

Great location near Knot's Berry Park and Disney Land.  Immediate access to the 91 & 5 freeways ,plus nice selection of restaurants close by. I have stayed at all of the hotel properties in the area, and this is the one I prefer because of the people running HOJO..

I'm really not terribly hard to please. I look for good value for my annual Anaheim trip and this hotel looked on its surface like it would fit the bill. There were problems. They did nothing about the dogs living in the broken down white van in the lot. We called the police and they rectified the situation. The safe in the room didn't work. The rude asian woman at the counter barked its a dollar fifty a day. I didn't ask what it cost, I asked for it to be fixed. There was no indication anywhere there was a charge for it, but the lousy buck 50 I wouldnt have cared. It was the rudeness. The maid fixed the room but forgot to leave clean towels. I called the desk at 430 and informed them. They told me I can go to the desk for towels, they cant send any to the room. Zero service.

Needed a place to stay for the night and this place offered a decent price. Not too pricey. The room was very spacious. Its clean, it’s not the best on decor but it’s better than Circus Circus Manor Lodge in Vegas when it comes to cleanliness, decor and overall room space. The place is quiet and they offer free breakfast. The only complain I have is that when they say free breakfast don’t expect any eggs, sausage, or fruits. They only have waffles, cereals and breads. The orange juice machine wasn’t even working only the apple juice machine. They do have coffee. We have stayed at another Howard Johnson location before in Torrance w/ free continental breakfast and they had eggs, sausages, fruits & muffins. I guess it varies per location?! Other wise this place is ok to stay if

Summary Heading: looking for a nice quite place
Summary: it was very peaceful and friendly people there, employees walked around the property keeping and eye on things. if you needed help they came to help right away . In the breakfast room employees kept checking on cleanliness and making sure there was plenty

Summary Heading: Good place to say near Disney and Knotts Berry farm
Summary: Good place to say near Disney and Knotts Berry farm, provides good waffle breakfast, the hotel is aged but well maintained.  Tons of fast food joints and restaurants nearby.  Prices were decent for the location

If the room had been swept and there was no hair in the restroom, I would have given it 3 stars. Definitely not worth what I paid. You can see it’s getting renevaded but take better care of the cleanliness of the property first!

Summary Heading: Dirtiest hotel I have ever stayed at
Summary: The hotel room was extremely dirty. We found hairs in the bathtub, multiple spiders in the room, and the smell was horrible. The furniture and carpet are so old and dirty that you dint even want to touch them. At $110 a night we figured it wasn't the Hilton but it would be decent, and we were very wrong.

We stayed here for several days for our girls vacation in Sept 2018. The rooms were decently clean and we were not bothered during our stay, either by people on the hotel site or employees. We did have a few speedbumps along the way. One, we were overcharged for the room and the fee was removed more than once from my account. It was returned but it was a hassle of calling to get it fixed. Two, we left an item in the room on checkout and called to ask if they could look. It was expensive so we were worried about it. No one got back to us so since we were still in town we drove back and asked for the key to look ourselves. Luckily, they had not given the room back out and the item was still where we had left it. But we were disappointed in the service and expected someone would

Summary Heading: Nice stay here but it's an older property
Summary: It is an older property there's nothing wrong with this property it's in a safe area, the guest service is excellent it's just the rooms and hallways are old and could use renovations but the bed is comfortable and the check in was excellent. If your just looking for a nice place to stay nothing fancy and you don't mind an older décor then this place is fine to stay at.

For the price we paid this place is not up to par, breakfast was terrible, out remote was taped close, bathroom very small and our sink had chips missing inside, upstairs the.people above us were loud, arguing and yelling waking us up at very early times in the morning.

our group enjoyed this trip, the hotel and surrounding areas were entertaining.  the hotel offered breakfast, and had rooms that looked luxury type.  they were remodeling the week we were there.  the remodeling was not a bother to our group.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: The beds were very clean, the microwave, bathroom floor and hair blow dryer could use some cleaning. Bathroom very out dated which make it look dirty. Would have been nice to have map of grounds with location of ice makers.

Summary Heading: Middle of the road place to stay.
Summary: They have nice rooms and accommodate those of us who can not climb stairs.  Friendly employees.  Laundry facility. An okay breakfast.  Location is good for my needs.  Good parking.  Okay swimming pool even though my family and I do not use it.

Hotel prices are very reasonable. Hotel was very clean including our room. Breakfast didn’t give much variety. Expect bagels, bread, cereal and waffles. Was hoping for some eggs and sausage. But you can’t be too picky. Will stay here again in the future!

The first room we were in was infested with ants on the nightstand and in the beds. Floor was filthy. The second room smelled like a sweaty gym & my 10 yr spotted semem on the bed. The third room was dirty, the bedding itched and kids said it felt like something was biting them.

Really dirty, sheets not clean, bed smelled like pee, sink and tub broken and leaking, terrible. We looked at 4 other rooms and they were all gross. Hair in the fridge. Dirty towels. 1 out of every 2 towels has long black hair on them. Tub wouldn't drain. Behind toilet was gross.

Customer service was excellent, front desk representatives where very professional. The only complaint that I have is the room is dated.  The decor is outdated as well. The beds were very comfortable. The price was more than I expected but due to the location I am assuming it was the going rate

It was better then a Best Western I had stayed. Value, clean, pool, and spa, and the pillows were good. (Better then the Best Western) So, it is close to everything we were doing and going to. So, Thank you.

Great price but it’s VERY dirty. Furniture was dirty, walls gross, bathroom had so much dust on the light fixture the dust fell when we opened the bathroom door. Won’t stay here again. It’s a convenient location, if this is your only choice bring bleach wipes/cleaning supplies. Your own sheets/blankets. Don’t forget your slippers, the floors are below satisfactory. And don’t rely on the breakfast, most days we couldn’t get a seat it was too packed. Eating area is small.

Will most definitely be back, was very affordable, nice curtious service, very clean, cozy, comfortable... My daughter loves the pool but did say it was too cold... Really that is the only thing I heard a complaint about... However it was 100 degrees outside...

Excellent service and amenities. I have stayed at all of the hotel and motels in the area and this is tops in my book.  Lots of restaurants near by including many ethnic ones. /close to the major freewys including Knotts Berry Farm and Disney Land.
Hotel easy to find. The breakfast is a little light. The negative part is the presence of Chinese travelers very noisy. The breakfast area is crowded when they arrive.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Howard Johnson Buena Park CA, We apologize for the group noise, Chinese usually arrive late from their flight and can make some noise while they settle down at night. We are constantly making changes to make all our guest's stay a positive one and I will be sure to pass on your comments to our management team.  Kind Regards, Richard

Summary Heading: Average, nothing spectacular, swimming pool not heated
Summary: Swimming pool was nice but too cold because there is no pool heater. The jacuzzi was terrible, hardly luke warm & no water pressure/bubbles
Manager Response: We appreciate your valuable feedback, the Spa does have a knob located by the wall where you can turn on the Spa and the jets, Next time don't hesitate to ask our staff to either show you or turn it on for you. We hope you will join us again in the near future. Regards, Hotel Management

Summary: House cleaning came into our room after being told not to and my granddaughter and grandsons bathing suits were taken along with my daughters iPhone charger and no one could tell us anything or knew anything about it.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for the price.
Summary: This was the second time staying at this hotel and it continues to be a decent place to stay. It's conveniently near many restaurants and theme parks. The rooms are decent and clean. Will stay here again next time I travel to this area.

Summary Heading: great deal & clean hotel friendly staff
Summary: The rooms are much bigger than motel 6 and clean with wooden flooring. Friendly and welcoming staff. The location is near to knotts berry farm which is very good, you can park in hotel and take $5 uber rather than paying $17 at knotts. Best WiFi 24 hours without interruptions. Highly recommended & will definitely stay again for sure.

Summary Heading: Good Location and Easy Access to Attractions!
Summary: For an older property the accommodations were well suited for our needs. Ground floor is a little on the noisy side but not not terrible. The safe in our room did not seem to be working and I asked front desk for assistance. Tried what they said and still no luck. They said they would send someone to look at it and never did. Other than that it was a good 2 night stay.

Summary Heading: Great deal and clean hotel, comfortable beds
Summary: Wonderful location. Five dollar Lyft ride to Knotts Berry Farm. Friendly staff, the room exceeded our standards. Very clean, the beds were comfortable. Free WiFi was able to complete course work while on vacation. Very pleased.
Everything was good except the mattress. It was too soft & break. It need to be check & re[place. Thanks.
Manager Response: Thank you! we will definitely have that mattress checked. It was great to hear you had a good stay and we hope to see you again soon! Sincerely, Richard

Summary Heading: Not a good room aparently your head is against the same...
Summary: Not a good room aparently your head is against the same wall as the lobby bathrooms was woke ip at 6am to toliets flushing water running people talking

Summary Heading: Ok, but will not stay again.
Summary: We travel a lot and have stayed in places that were not as comfortable as others, but we will not stay here again.

Summary Heading: This was a nice getaway location. Near several food...
Summary: This was a nice getaway location. Near several food options. Offered a microwave and refrigerator in the room which is a plus for me. The breakfast was good and the areas were clean

Nice friendly staff at desk , room was really nice . Matress 0needs to be changed out to saggy and old , sheets wouldn’t stay on the matress. Has bbq , pool , jacuzzi , nice breakfast . Make sure you lock everything up stuff missing from bed of pickup it’s open parking to a commercial area next door !
Manager Response: DearPMPCS, Thank you for your AMAZING review. We are really proud to hear that we were able to accommodate your travel needs and service was as you expected. Thank you for choosing The Buena Park Howard Johnson for your travel destination and we are looking forward to welcome you and your family back soon! Sincerely,

Summary: Front desk staff very unprofessional. Couldn’t even speck English. Had no idea what I was saying and I couldn’t understand them. Didn’t treat me like a paying customer.  They need more training or morals.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Please accept our apologies for the unpleasant experience you had with us. I will let our front desk team know about the issues you mentioned to perfect those areas, we really do want to win you over.  Sincerely, Richard

Summary: I stay here each year when I visit family in Buena Park for a week to 10 days.  We don't spend much time other than to sleep in the room so no sense paying a lot for a room.  Our room this year appeared to be somewhat updated.  Rooms are clean.  Housekeeping is efficient.  No issues with staff. Continental breakfast is light - toast, bagels, waffles, 2 cereals, 2 juices and coffee.   If you are looking for a place to sleep without going broke this is the place for you.

Summary Heading: I could not check into my reserved room because of a software update. Therefore I had no place to sleep.
Summary: Until this last reservation, where I could not check in to my room, I only had good things to say about this hotel. But not having a bed to sleep in (& its 45°) was not appreciated. A man called earlier in day to tell me my credit card had been declined. I informed him that when I booked room, the website had randomly picked the credit card without letting me pick correct card. When he called me, I offered to give him the new credit card info for card I had wanted to use. He said no need, can do it later when I checkin. That day my car was being worked on by a friend & it was taking much longer than I expected.& so as it got late, I called man at hotel & asked if he wanted my credit card info because I did not want to lose my room. Once again, he said"no need, I will make sure

I was here in the month of October and I’d say I’d definitely go back again. The staff extremely friendly and also the place was calm and quiet. I’d recommend it to anybody. Super clean rooms and pretty big too!
Manager Response: Dear Valuable guest, Thank you for your AMAZING review. We are really proud to hear that we were able to accommodate your travel needs and service was as you expected. Thank you for choosing The Buena Park Howard Johnson for your travel destination and we are looking forward to welcome you and your family back soon! Sincerely, Richard

Summary Heading: Can’t be beat for the price
Summary: Honest opinion, this place has owners who care about the appearance and experience here. The continental breakfast is very decent. Pool always clean, staff is awesome. I’ve had problems with many locations and stayed everywhere. This location I have been a guest at many times and not one time has their been an occurrence. Carl is THEE BEST at the front desk. He’s courteous, kind and always has a great attitude. I always recommend this location and will never hesitate to book here at any time. It’s clean and maintained very well. Staff I feel I can trust. I left a bag there and they had it for me. I really appreciate you rare hard to find honest people. 😇
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of our property. I genuinely appreciate your kind words for our property and staff and your recommendation of us to others. Our staff members strive to make sure our guests have a fantastic time while visiting and I’m glad they made sure you had everything you needed, We take our guest comments very seriously and always strive to provide comfortable and friendly accommodations. We appreciate your nice comment about customer service and myself, Thanks David Sincerely; Carl

Summary: Terrible service. Had to wait in lobby, room was dirty, toaster was broken for morning breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay at Howard Johnson Buena Park, CA. We take our guest comments very seriously and always strive to provide comfortable and friendly accommodations.   However, we’re sorry we fell below your expectation regarding the renovation and breakfast experience. We will address these concern. We take all reviews positive and negative very seriously, and your feedback will help us improve for our next guest or your next visit.  Sincerely, Richard Carl

Summary: This hotel is very conveniently located to two theme parks as well as restaurants,fast food restaurants and a Target for any last minute travel needs. The staff were all extremely nice and helpful which made checking in and out a breeze. There were 2 ants in the sink area of the bathroom but once we got rid of them we had no other issue.
Manager Response: Dear cangoco, Thank you for your AMAZING review. We are really proud to hear that we were able to accommodate your travel needs and service was as you expected. Thank you for choosing The Buena Park Howard Johnson for your travel destination and we are looking forward to welcome you and your family back soon! Sincerely Richard

Summary: It was an okay stay at this hotel. There were guests who were very loud till late at night and some extra early the next morning.  The regular patrons are good but the bus loads of Asians are rude, loud and eat all the food in the breakfast room.  We travel almost every month and this is not our favorite but sometimes it is the most reasonably priced.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Howard Johnson - Buena Park.. We apologize for your noise issue  and that our breakfast didn't meet your expectations. we do get a lot of Chinese groups every week, next time don't hesitate to request a room on the second floor, its quieter since they do come late at night and leave early, also we have a breakfast attendant that restocks the items and makes sure we never run out.  We are constantly making changes to make all our guest's stay a positive one and I will be sure to pass on your comments to our management team.  Sincerely, Ricardo GM

Summary: I smoke in the room even though I didn't try to keep my deposit had to fight to get my deposit back it was terrible and the manager was rude
Manager Response: Dear;jamespU9597IX Please accept our apologies for the unpleasant experience you had with us. Our hotel is non-smoking, and like you stated in your claim, "I smoke in the room even though I didn't try to keep my deposit had to fight to get my deposit back it was terrible and the manager was rude"""we do have smoking areas for you to smoke and not inside our rooms, yes we will try to keep your deposit if you brake our policy's, but you got your deposit back! . Sincerely, Richard

Summary: We got there after midnight. Staff was helpful and friendly. As soon as I walked in the room was more than enough. The beds were comfortable and not bad of a location. We will continue to stay here for our future stays
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear you were impressed with your accommodations. We appreciate your valuable feedback and look forward to sharing your review with our team. We hope you will join us again in the near future. Regards, Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Ok hotel things could be better
Summary: We booked a room for 2 double beds but when we arrived they said all they had was a king bed. So three people 2 adults and a child all shared one bed. Not the most comfortable. Then when we went to our room the door was open. I saw other rooms the same way. Not the most safest for guests when its not a locked down facility.  I was fearful someone could have been waiting in my room. I was very disappointed in the breakfast. Waffles, cereals, toast, and bagles. All carbs. I have stayed at another Whyndham hotel and that one we had eggs, sausage, and biscuit and gravy. Something with protein would have been nice. The first night when I checked in I went back down to the front desk to ask for a luggage rack and the night staff did not put in any effort to find one. Overall the place
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Buena Park Howard Johnson. We apologize for the doors been open, after reviewing times and rooms allocations, we had a group of Chinese and they love leaving their doors open since they jump from room to room, our location is one of the safest and never any issues unlike other local hotels.  and we apologize  that our breakfast didn't meet your expectations. We are constantly making changes to make all our guest's stay a positive one and I will be sure to pass on your comments to our management team.also after reviewing  the reservation details it was made online or 800 number for one bed, not here at the property, also the confirmation email sent to you on 6/17/2017 at around 8:11 am was for one king bed  Kind Regards, Richard

Summary: Our bathroom was dirty- feces on the front of the toilet-stayed for 3 nights not once was it cleaned off of the toilet. Another family members room had a mouse running around in it- Wish I could have gotten a refund! It was not worth the money!
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for the unpleasant experience you had with us. I will let our housekeeping and maintenance department know about the issues you mentioned to perfect those areas. next time don't hesitate to let our front desk staff know of any issues while your staying here so we can address the problems at that moment, also no one made a report of a mouse inside the room. We hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future. Sincerely, Richard

Summary: Upon entering the room we were overwhelmed by a musty, moldy smell and the room was sweltering.  The walls are so poorly insulated that the heat from the setting sun seemed to penetrate straight through the walls.  The bathroom was dirty upon arrival severely in need of maintenance... The water for the shower had no happy medium to the temp.  It was either scalding hot or freezing cold and fluctuated back and forth the entire time. Summary Heading: Great Price and Location, OK for the price
Summary: Can't beat the price.  Definitely don't expect a luxury hotel, its pretty outdated.  Very clean, staff was great at check-in.  Parking, Internet and breakfast were free.

The room was clean.  The front desk staff did a good job even with a new employee getting training.  I was able to get a printed receipt when checking out.  The continental breakfast area was fell stocked and clean.  The only negative was the loud room above me that probably had children and parents let them jump and be loud then later about 2 am there was some couple that was loud.  The hotel has very little control over the rude, selfish behavior of others.

I have been there for a week and trust me on this it felt just like home. The manager was soo helpful and patient, the place looked as good as new and the breakfast was just fine. Would recommend it to anybody who wants a comfortable stay!
Good rooms and has free internet and parking but the style from out looks like motels or like vegass apts

Summary Heading: Good, clean, close to amusement parks.
Summary: This was a very convenient and inexpensive room. Pool is small and right off the lobby. Small dining area, but good food for breakfast. Staff was friendly, but a bit scattered. No towels in my room after maid left. Two bottles of lotion and no shampoo when we arrived. Dated decor, not enough outlets at the table/desk. Bathtub was spongy, stained, cracked and likely leaking out to somewhere.  Noisy at bedtime with folks above us.
Needless to say this was a great location & place to stay. the hotel staff were really great too!!

Summary Heading: Bed bugs rm 115, Told staff , ignored me. Showed proof w/ pictures & captured bed bug. Stay 3 nghts.
Summary: Bed bugs rm 115, Told staff , ignored me. Showed proof w/ pictures & captured bed bug. Stay 3 nghts.

Summary Heading: For the value can't get much more
Summary: If you need a place to lay your head while you visit the many attractions near by.Save some money for the good stuff. Good enough for me and my family. There was some crumbs on the bed which was weird but nothing too odd. Would stay again.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear you find us as a great value. We appreciate your valuable feedback and look forward to sharing your review with our team.. I will also let our housekeeping and maintenance department know about the issues you mentioned to perfect those areas We hope you will join us again in the near future. Regards, Hotel Management

Summary: The "hot breakfast " was waffles and packets of hot chocolate. I got up and grabbed some napkins and the staff told me, "you can't take food out of this area". Meanwhile white people were walking out with plates full of food.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay. My sincere apologies for the mix up during breakfast. We have a big goal: to provide great guest service, while we’re at it. I’m so sorry we fell short of your expectations. i don't think their intentions where to be prejudice, its just as simple as they assumed that you where taking food out, its hard to keep track of everyone taking food out of the breakfast room even when we have signs all over that states that.  The next time you’re back in town, let me know! I would love the chance to personally make sure your next stay is an all-out success. We really do want to win you over. Sincerely, Richard

Summary: The room was clean and welcoming. The internet connectivity was very good. The amenities mentioned in their website were provided as stated. The ambiance of the place was cozy enough and other guests were not noisy or rowdy. Overall, we had a pleasant stay. I will surely stay in this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. I am happy to hear that your stay was great and you find your room accommodations lovely. We hope to welcome you back soon and on your next visit,   Sincerely, Richard

Summary: Purchased 3 rooms for a trip to Knotts. We were very happy with the rooms and service. They have a patio with a BBQ, along with the pool and small Jacuzzi; in the rooms, you get a frig, micro and coffee pot. Great place to stay for a few days!  The rooms are a good size and the beds weren't bad. The breakfast is you're standard set up. I do suggest that you email them for any info, they are now owned by Windham, after attempting to call them and getting stuck in the crazy Windham cycle, I emailed them. I received a reply in less then 24 hours!

Summary Heading: Clean and quiet location. Very friendly staff.
Summary: Customer service here was awesome, very friendly and helpful.  Hotel is located in a quiet location.  Rooms were clean.
I got an upgraded room, it was very nice and large!   You can tell they have been remodeling, the sinks are older, paint needs touch ups but overall, super clean and very very comfortable!

Summary Heading: Not so Bueno in Buena Park
Summary: We were in an "upgraded" room - good points: furniture looked new . Breakfast was okay and Heater worked good. Outside appearance looks nice. Wifi good Not so good points: Front door would not stay closed unless dead bolted.  Bathroom door would not stay closed and it took 5 min (no kidding) for shower water to heat up.  TV faded in/out.  Less than 10 sheets of toilet paper on roll with no backup in room.  Two phone calls made, front desk told us to come and get it. 1hr later they finally brought some. If you want to use room safe they charge a 1.50 p/day.  Bed was a 2 out of 5, whoever upgraded bathroom forgot to sand, and only put 1 coat of paint.

Stay here earlier in the month, at first I was skeptical about my stay but upon arrival I was greeted with great customer service and also the room I was given was very good and updated. They stay over all was well over what I had expected and I will defiantly be coming back in the future.

Recently stayed here for a business trip , the staff was very friendly and super helpful. The wifi was very fast as well witch made it easy for me for me to do my work. I defiantly look forward to coming back in the future

The hotel is nice.  On the medium side of a 0-100 scale.  The rooms are clean and comfortable for the most part.  Some rooms are a bit run down and need upgrades.  Conveinent location to amusement parks, restaurants, grocery stores and department stores.  The free breakfast room is nice and food is okay (not great)  Price is very reasonable.

This is a very average hotel.  It was in a good location, decent price, pretty comfortable.  The walls were thin and we got a lot of noise from outside and upstairs.  The bathroom could have been a little cleaner. They did provide us with the roll away we requested, which was a god-send.  If you are looking for an average hotel at a decent price, fairly close to Disney and other parks, this will do.

Summary Heading: Howard Johnson is now a third world property
Summary: Wow it has been a while since we stayed at a Howard Johnson motel but will never again do so. Room smelled and so did the pillow and bed spread. The toilet ran all night until finally I shut off the water supply. The TV was so blurry you could hardly see anything just like in the 50's with rabbit ears. The hair dryer did not work and the room was very noisy with paper thin walls and ceilings. Called the front desk and the person who answered said she would let the manager know. The Breakfast had waffles and toast, no hot breakfast, no fruit at all, no yogurts, no muffins and terrible coffee.

The parking is next to some storage type units not very secure since anyone can access the parking lot from there. General cheap repairs to old building. The night service window is not handicap accessible. Room service was knocking in the morning even when the signs of do NOT disturb was hanging. The door has a gap between the bottom of it and the threshold, letting noise and light, dust, etc in we had to put a towel but still you can hear people talking in the room in front of us.

Summary Heading: Great stay, noise-cancellation rooms, very clean
Summary: All the reviews I read were good so I knew I was going to have a great stay and I DID! Everything was clean, fresh, and quiet, just what I needed. Excellent location.

Room was alright not cleaned well, left over soap bar on ridge in shower. Room next to us was loud and talking outside room til 2 in the morning and was smoking next to our door. Overall hotel wasn't to bad just bad neighors

I stayed in this hotel for 40 days to visit my family and friends. It is perfect location. Very next to the 91 freeway. All employees are very friendly. Services and all other things made me comfortable throughout the staying
Manager Response: , Thank you for your AMAZING review. We are really proud to hear that we were able to accommodate your travel needs and service was as you expected. Thank you for choosing The Buena Park Howard Johnson for your travel destination and we are looking forward to welcome you and your family back soon!   Sincerely Richard.

Summary: The rooms were dirty and did not accommodate my handicap at all! Had to leave early for a family emergency and almost didn't get my deposit back because we checked out early even though we still payed for the night we didn't stay
Loved it Clean very comfortable. There was everything we needed and more. I would recommend this place to anyone.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear you were impressed with your accommodations. We appreciate your valuable feedback and look forward to sharing your review with our team. We hope you will join us again in the near future. Regards, Hotel Management

Summary: Went on Sunday no big lines place was fun clean and inviting Mrs Knott's chicken cafe very pricy opted to go to Mrs knots Togo chicken half the price Bought a whole pie $ 10.99 all the employees were friendly rides were fun,  especially  The jaguar roller coaster $ 18 to park seems high, went on the Internet for park admission tickets only $47 great day. Highly suggest this over Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay, - . We are so happy to hear your stay went well and it is also very kind of you to detail your stay so others reading our reviews can really get a feel for our hotel.  Kind Regards, Richard

Summary: After reading some negative reviews, I was afraid of what we may find. Our room seemed to be updated with paint and some bathroom fixtures appeared newer. It wasn't the Ritz Carlton, but it was clean, it smelled good, all the linens and towels were clean and smelled good. The room was spacious! We had taken the kids to Knott's Scary Farm and simply needed a place to get some sleep. We could hear a little of the racket in the parking area, but all-in-all, this was a good place to get some sleep before heading back home. I would give it a very satisfactory rating! Also, it was a larger facility then I planned and within 8 minutes of Knott's. I would stay again!

The facility was really beautiful for the value. The landscaping was truly beautiful. Our only problem there was with check in and the problem was not the property's issue, it was with the reservationist but the clerk was extremely helpful in trying to resolve the problem to the best of her ability.

My husband and I stayed here on our way back up north. We arrived around 7-8pm and the doors were locked. No sign up and empty lobby. There was a window for after hours service and a doorbell. We rang it for 5 minutes and even tried calling before a kid comes from somewhere and goes to open the door. My husband asks if he works here and he said "Yeah" and walks in. Instead of coming to the window, he stays at the counter doing stuff on the computer. We noticed he didn't lock the doors to the lobby so we went in and asked to check in. Not very good with customer service as my husband tried to make small talk and he wasn't reacting. We got our key and went up to our room. It was quiet when we got there...or so we thought. The room was small but clean and decent. We were only there

2nd worst Howard Johnson I've stayed at.....please remove them from Wyndams points ...wished I never wasted my points on this room.  Towels were thin, old and small.  Overall horrible....never stay there again....found a bug in restroom.....painted walls were a joke!! Never again!! This is the 2nd hotel using Howard Johnson that rated the same, thought I'd give them one last chance!!!!!!!!!

The air conditioner was bad and loud. took forever to cool off the room. The bathroom was not clean especially the faucet area and the tub, seems like the maids clean the bathroom once every week instead of maintaining it everyday. also once you use the shampoos or conditioners, they were not replenished. The room was dingy and had 2 color walls. The beds were not comfortable and the red sheets on top were very dirty. The used towels were not replaced. The breakfast area ran out of oranges and when asked then it was filled. But when it ran out it was not refilled until constant asking. Overall very poor service.

I stayed one month ago..I stayed 5 days in Howard Johnson .it was awesome stay..good and friendly service at frond desk..and I stayed in up graded room..nice rooms and free parking..and continental breakfast is good..wifi works good.
The room air conditioner was very loud, so loud that we just turned it off. Many rude guests that got up early were talking really loudly near our room at 5:30am woke us up.

Stayed at this hotel a couple months ago and it was very pleasant and affordable. It was very close to knotts berry farm witch is where I went for the weekend. The rooms were clean and very nice. Also the free breakfast in the morning was a plus. Will defiantly be back soon.

Summary Heading: Better than average room, location and services
Summary: We would prefer to stay closer to the Long Beach, California area but hotels are more expensive.  This is a better than average hotel.  We have stayed several times and everything has been good.  As long as they do not have a bus load of people the breakfast  food is efficient.  Rooms are just average, nothing excellant.

hotel was great, the free breakfast was also nice, however the room to eat was a little too packed and some people were getting out of hand with the free waffles to make yourself and had 10 cups of batter waiting instead of just letting the next person make theirs. that was irritating. hotel was clean and basic amenities like a fridge and microwave was nice.

Front desk clerk was very rude and lacked people skills. Door lock worn out and needs replaced. It took several tries to open. Everything in the room is outdated, broken, or in need of repair. Had to fill toilet tank every time we needed to flush as the toilet was broken. Room and common areas very dirty. Faucet and fixtured cracked, broken, and leaked. Pubic hair in shower and on toilet upon arrival. Female hair on towels and floors. Non smooking room smelled of smoke. Found several cigarette butts in room and notified front desk who informed me to just throw them away. I left debating if I should get a tetanus shot or get tested for something. I would not recommend this location to anyone and I am surprised that they are still operational.

we checked into our room in the afternoon, but did not have time to go to the room till later that evening.   When we arrived, first:  our room keys did not work and we had to go to the front of the hotel to a walkup window to tell the clerk.and get new keys.  Second:  when we got into the room, it was so hot it felt like a sauna!   The A/C had NOT been turned on despite the 90 plus degree weather all week!   Called the desk who said "it will be fine in about 15 to 20 minutes"...right, hah!   over 2 hours later was it cool enough to actually think about sleeping without sweating!...and during the course of our 4 day stay, DAILY our keys would not work!...they kept saying to us, you must be keeping your keys by your phones...NO we were NOT!   very, very aggravating!   And while

Summary Heading: The rooms and areas are clean
Summary: The rooms and areas are clean and the prices are very good. Close to Disney and Knotts berry farm.

Good: Sheets smelled clean, checkout clerk/ manager on duty was nice and allowed my early checkout. Everything else was awful. OLD hotel, towels seemed like they were about 20 years old. Room was outdated, hair on bathroom floor (upon arrival! NOT cleaned well enough) No body soap, Thank goodness I took mine. Air conditioner sounded like it was going to fall apart AND no hot water for 3 minutes while showering!! AND the check in clerk signed me up to be a Wyndham reward member without telling me.He just asked for my email and signed me up. I DID NOT appreciate that. I have not unsubscribed to all emails.

Summary Heading: Stayed there 08/20/16, rooms smelled like ciggarette smoke...
Summary: Stayed there 08/20/16, rooms smelled like ciggarette smoke mentioned it to front desk. Went in the room to prove if it did or do not smell. He argued with me that it did not at this time it was 1:00 am and was traveling with my children whom were already asleep. I was not going to look for another hotel at that hour of the night. Next day went to breakfast which was pretty lame tried the pool and found roaches floating.  I also complaint this to the front desk that morning, who could care less.Never again will I stay here. I got to say it was pretty cheap $$ had I know this was going to happen I would of spend more money ELSEWHERE

i stayed couple weeks ago.i stayed 5 days in hotel.i stayed in upgraded room.that room is really nice and the staff in the front desk is very helpful and iam new one for this place..they helped me alot.and pool area is clean.free parking and great thing is continental breakfast.wifi service is good.iam satisfied with the price....

Summary Heading: Bad experience, would not recomend. Sad it's part of a well known franchise.
Summary: Front Desk Clerk was awefull, badly needing some customer service skills. He does not know how to make their guest feel welcomed at their motel. It took about 15 tries to open the door to get into the room, room lock (116) needs a new once, simply its warn out and old.  I would not stay in that property ever again.

The rooms are nice size even tho property is older. The pool area was outstanding and having a courtyard to entertain grandchildren was really nice, also having a laundry on site for wet swimsuits and towels was nice. Staff was very nice and we will deffently stay here again.

Clean, attractive motel but too pricey for what it was. Check in clerk signed me up for Wyndham Rewards before asking, I said NO very firmly and now I am getting endless e-mails. Check out clerk was very rude, tried to deny me enough ice to keep two sodas cold in a cooler bag.
Hotel was very nice, clean and the staff was very nice.  The breakfast was great.  The hotel is close to amenities and in a good neighborhood.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear you were impressed with your accommodations. We appreciate your valuable feedback and look forward to sharing your review with our team. We hope you will join us again in the near future. Regards, Hotel Management

Summary: The front desk service is pretty good and the pool area is kept very clean and neat and the house keeping service is very quick at serving and the breakfast is delicious and most important thing NO WIFI PROBLEM
Manager Response: Dear Sunny K, Thank you for your AMAZING review. We are really proud to hear that we were able to accommodate your travel needs and service was as you expected. Thank you for choosing The Bueana Park Howard Johnson for your travel destination and we are looking forward to welcome you and your family back soon!  Sincerely, Richard

Summary: Room given was very outdated, nothing like the pictures. The room smelled weird. Bathroom smelled. Walls were not painted evenly. The room just gave an unwelcome feeling. It need more work to be done too the rooms. I walked past other rooms and they looked ok, but the room we were given was not. Can hear upstairs people walking. Its like they only fixed certain rooms, not the whole hotel. Breakfast not good. Had plenty of parking. Did not get chance to use the pool. Would not stay again, will pay more for a better night sleep.

Summary Heading: Feedback on Howard Johnson Hotel, Buena Park
Summary: The t.v. in the room did not work.  They replaced it.  Had requested two queen sized beds but when I got there they gave me a King.  Even though they had some available,the clerk did not want to change my reservation.  My reservation was prepaid and I was then forced to pay extra for a roll away bed.  I will not personally be staying here again!

I thought the hotel was really nice. However the staff in-service left a lot to be desired. The night ma The night manager brought a whole new meaning to the definition of unfriendly.  I guess if you are expecting a rollaway after the maid service leaves you can forget it.  If you are used to being greeted with a smile you can forget that too.  If you are expecting a hot breakfast do not bother instead go to Black bear but be sure and share with somebody because the portions are huge.  The food was amazing.  I wish I was reviewing black bear restaurant this whole review would've went a lot differently.  I would not recommend this hotel just due to service I feel like service is a great part of the experience and tells a lot about a place

I chose this hotel because we were traveling on a budget, and the LA area is very expensive. I was really hoping it would be better because it wasn't even cheap. The rooms were small, and they lookes dim and old. The beds were just tolerable and seemed clean enough. The bathroom was ok but overall the room smelled weird, and the carpet had weird stains. The breakfast was ok ish, bagels, toast, cheese, butter and waffles that were better than expected. It wasn't completely horrible and the location was convenient but they need to make some changes.

I had called 2 days before just to make sure the served breakfast like the Hojo in Fullerton. The lady I spoke to at your 1-800# said they did. When we checked in it was dirty no breakfast only contential there was mole on the was by the bathroom. I had booked for 5 days. I found out they didn't have the breakfast so I cancelled my rest of my days. I only stayed one night. My kids needed a full breakfast before we got our day started.

Recently came across this hotel while I was in town , the rooms were very nice and clean. They also have free breakfast in the morning, the waffles are very good. Also the wifi was pretty fast as well, I was able to get all my work done for my job. Very nice stay.

Summary Heading: Pictures of this property are deceiving
Summary: The pictures of this property made it look clean and kept up well. Even in their lobby they show pictures of rooms with wooden floors. The room I got was a very dirty carpet that smelled like wet mold, as if someone washed the carpet but didn't let it fully dry. Then the bathroom also had a shower curtain that smelled moldy. My room was on the first floor and it was obvious that someone tampered with the window screen. I never opened the window. Needless to say, the state of the room forced me to stay longer in the parks. They also claimed to have WiFi but it didn't even reach our room.
For the price it's a good deal. But the bathroom really needed a cleaning. There was hair in the shower, sink and on the floor. Very gross.

Clean room with cold A/C. We checked in  hours early with no add'l charge. Very friendly front desk staff. Pool and jacuzzi were nice. Good location for major attractions. Microwave and mini fridge are a plus.

Summary Heading: The worst hotel i have used in years
Summary: Expensive, old,smelly, noisy ac,old bed, stained sheets, and I can keep going...really the worst in years. I don't know , how could be sell as a howard johnson, I think they don't supervise the affiliated  hotels.

I stayed for 2 days here and the service was really great. Nishanth the person who works at front desk was very kind helpful. Affordable prices, very clean and friendly environment with swimming pool,laundry wide car parking and very near to restaurants for lunch and dinner. Also breakfast is free with lots of delicious food. WiFi services are very good with great speeds and big flat TV. Over all great hotel to stay with family and friends. Will stay here again and definitely recommend to my friends.

Like others stated, Wifi was on and off but good enough to check emails and some quick work.  The disgusting part was the bath tub was poorly draining and you got dirty water while taking a shower. This is because they put a strainer which prevents water to flow freely but saves the hotel maintenance.  The room is spacious for the price paid.  The staffs are friendly.  The breakfast is a bonus.

I Found this little hotel in buena park after a family party, it was very nice , the front desk was very helpful in helping me get a room and price was very affordable. I also liked that fact that they have free breakfast in the morning, defiantly have a pleasant stay here.

Came across this nice hotel, the service was great and the room price was very affordable. The rooms are nice as well, I would definitely  recommend  this hotel if you are ever in town and need somewhere to stay. I look coward to coming back to this hotel whenever I am in town.

Went to check into this hotel and the front desk told me I had three rooms reserved for that night. Had a long frustrating conversation in which I showed my confirmation number including description indicating I only had one room and the front desk said they could not help me and my cost was going to be $500.  After another frustrating conversation I finally got the front desk to cancel those other two rooms. Went to my room and the floor was in such bad repair that the entire room was slanted towards the door. It was as if everything was trying to run out of there. In the bathroom the sink was leaking and underneath the cabinet was wet and the wood was soft and rotted.  Finally, The next morning when I went to shower I couldn't use one of the wash cloths because it had several

Recently came down for work and I found this nice hotel to stay at. It was very affordable and the rooms were pretty nice. It was also very convenient that it was located very close to the 91 freeway, it made it easy for me to get to and from work while I was in town. Great service.

Good hotel, I was in town for a family emergency and needed somewhere to stay for a decent price, I came across this Howard Johnson , it was very affordable and the rooms were pretty nice, they also had free breakfast in the morning, I look forward to coming back if I am ever in town.

Recently stated at Howard Johnson for a family vacation. The staff was great and really friendly/helpful. I would defiantly recommend this hotel , great hotel for a very affordable price. I will definitely be back here for my next family vacation!

This hotel serves all of our needs and the the staff was always helpful. It is less than a five minute drive to Knottsberry Farm and if you want to walk, it will take about 45 minutes. The micro wave, refrigerator, free parking, and Continental Breakfast are great to have for families with children. There is a grocery store that sells hot meals, fast food restaurants and other family attractions nearby. The internet service did work and was okay for us.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Howard Johnson - Buena Park. We are so happy to hear your stay went well and it is also very kind of you to detail your stay so others reading our reviews can really get a feel for our hotel. We are thrilled to hear you were impressed with your accommodations We thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you back soon, and i will definitely let my staff know they are doing a great job.  Kind Regards, Ricardo

Summary: I must admit this hotel was worth the money. Fathers Day I spent by the pool & cooking steaks on the grill ( BOTH AT THIS HOTEL) That's right the hotel had a cooking area (BYOF) which was in great condition. Room was comfortable but cable tv kept going in and out as I was watching the Finals. Other than that my stay was great, I'll be back 4sure  Lucian Scott
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear you were impressed with your accommodations and enjoyed the BBQ area. We appreciate your valuable feedback and look forward to sharing your review with our team. We hope you will join us again in the near future. Regards, Hotel Management Ricardo

Summary: Had to keep going to the front desk to activate cards for the room. Maid service wouldn't provide bathroom tissue, had to go to the front desk to get that also.

At first the hotel seemed great! Until you went to turn on lights, or plug anything into an outlet that had a lamp plugged in to it. Lamps didn't work, outlets didn't work with multiple cords plugged in it. The sink leaked, the beds were uncomfortable, the sheets had multiple rips and would not stay on the bed. The bathtub filled with water as you took a shower, it took forever to drain and so the next person who needed to shower had to shower in gross tub water. The tv didn't work, it was either fuzzy and we had to wiggle the cables to  "try" and get a clear pciture. Or it was a black screen and only sound. When we went to the office to speak with someone, they told us we had to wait and speak to a manager who would be in later in the afternoon. We were there to go to

I enjoyed my stay at Howard Johnson's Buena Park. The property was well maintained, and clean, the room was attractive and well furnished. The bed was comfortable. My only discomfort was that I was booked into room 207, which happened to be directly above the men's restroom in the lobby downstairs. When someone would use the restroom, the light and ventilator fan would go on for approximately 20 minutes to 1/2 hour, which produced a loud humming sound (80 db at 120Hz) in the room, which was disturbing. While the lobby closed at 9 PM, I was concerned that use of this restroom would awaken me in the middle of the night. I would advise management to quiet this fan for guests staying in room 207. Summary Heading: JAPANESE OWNER ONLY CARES ABOUT MONEY NOT CUSTOMERS.
Summary: Room not worth 127.00. Tv  not working correctly. View out window was a warehouse feet away. Misleading of breakfast not continental box cereal

When we checked in I asked about getting credit for the night but was told that it could not be done since the reservations was not booked through the hotel itself.  So that meant we lost points for our night stay.  We also had the toilet plug up and we were told to come to the front desk and pick up a plunger.  So my husband took care of the problem.
The room was horrible,hot and smelled. The shower head was awful(didn't use). Free breakfast was also bad. Will not ever stay again. Not the Howard Johnson's I remember

There are few things that should be updated.  11am is the time to leave it should be at 12:00pm. Some families have children to get them ready.  More channels on the tv.  There is only 4 channels and they are channels to buy things.  They need channels like FOX NEWS, local channels.  In the room that I stood the window stuck I need air (fresh air)

We did not get lucky this time.  There were many Asian people bused in and of course they flock to the free food first thing in the morning.  I tried to get a bagel and had to wait 3 or 4 minutes while an Asian man took up the whole counter and toaster area.  They are rude, they never smile, they do not say excuse me, they handle the food instead of using the tongs and we are very tired of them.  It is their attitude and the Asian Woman who is the owner who caters to them and she never smiles or speaks to us either.  We will be looking for a nicer place from now on.  We are in town about once every 4 to 5 weeks and it was a nice place.  Not worth the points.

Summary Heading: Room was okay. Carpet was gross, staff was short and to the...
Summary: Room was okay. Carpet was gross, staff was short and to the point. Older, needs new beds and carpet. Area is not very inviting or friendly. Was uncomfortable leaving my car parked there. Walls are paper thin and can hear everything from surrounding rooms.

I call and it was to hard to understand the front desk person. When we arrived customer service skills were poor and at 1025am in the morning the knocked at my door to tell me I had to check out. That was completely unnecessary. The breakfast area tables were all dirty they ran out of waffle batter. Overall, not impressed. Not coming back for sure. Poor service for the money I paid.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay. My sincere apologies for the mix up during your check out. We have a big goal: to provide great guest service and keep everything sparkly and clean, while we’re at it. I’m so sorry we fell short of your expectations. The next time you’re back in town, let me know! I would love the chance to personally make sure your next stay is an all-out success. We really do want to win you over. Sincerely, Ricardo F.

Summary Heading: Great Price wish I would have spent a little more
Summary: At first glance I thought the hotel was very nice. But as we arrived late that night it was difficult to actually judge it. I wouldn't really recommend it if you have small kids. The room on the first night was actually nice, other than the fact we only had 1 towel in the bathroom. Second night not so much, the room upstairs kept slamming the door, and stopping on the floor till about 1:00 am. Needless to say when I called the front desk to complain, no answer! So yeah won't be staying there anymore. If you're looking for something cheap great place. Something nice stay elsewhere! Oh yeah and keep an eye out for your bags at the crappy breakfast!
Loved my stay because my room was clean, beds were comfortable. Quiet atmosphere. Good amount of parking. I had a good experience for my first time. Thank you

Hardware condition of the hotel is average to low. Continental breakfast items are simple and the room is too small to meet its guest room capacity. Hotel relies on travel agency to fennel international tourist groups. The only positive side is it is quiet away from freeway.

Been my second time to go here but I always forget to put a review since I am busy with my business.   But anyway since I have free time, I am really impressed with all the employee here. They are all professional they do know how to communicate with their guest. When I got here my first night was really exhausting due to I have a long flight and have to get all my stuff, but one of the maintenance helped me bring my stuff inside my room. And the front desk did really help me to check in at my room. In easy way and super fast service, Ricardo is such a nice employee here I love this guy! IF you guys have any question regarding your extended night just ask for ricardo and he will be happy to help you. Not to mention the night audit guys I don't know if I got his name correctly
First room I've stayed in with hard wood floors. Very nice! Waffles for complementary breakfast was a plus! A block off the freeway and around the corner from knott's berry farm and mid evil times.

The rooms were okay the  front looks good until you get around to  the back landscape was all dug up and mostly dead plants rooms were not clean window ledge had mold in it  AND pull rod was broken and toilet paper role fall  off the wall and the door latch did not work and  when i  turned  on the light socket was broken and behind the beds was lots of trash food wrappers  ...AND PEOPLE UPSTAIRS WERE MAKING NOISE ALL NIGHT LONG SOUNDED LIKE RUINING

Summary Heading: One of the worst hotels to stay in....

Lots of families, really loud, hardly slept. Every single towel had a stain on it of one type or another. Staff in lobby was extremely nice, the breakfast was pretty good but they should really step it up with housekeeping. Even the mini refrigerator was dirty.

Summary Heading: One of the worst hotels I have ever stayed in.
Summary: Smells old. I used fabreze on lamp shades, drapes, chairs, bed skirts and left the window open for a while. When another room turns on the water it is very loud. You can hear conversations in the next room. The ceiling noise was terrible from 1st floor. Very dirty shower and grout on floor. Cheap shower curtain and bed linens and small towels. Back end of hotel is dirty with the dumpster and feels unsafe. No Wifi even after asked for help to get it working in our room and another room that family was staying in. Breakfast takes forever as they only had 1 of each appliance. Food wasn't very good. Wouldn't stay there again.
I enjoyed the stay and how close to the freeway it was. Was surprised how close Knotts Berry Farm.

We paid around $95(including taxes) per night for a family of 4(two adults and two kids). I will say it's okay but nothing great. They call the morning breakfast as Deluxe Continental but it's very ordinary breakfast(bread, jam, butter, cereals, coffee, orange and apple juice and that's it). Some of the stuff like Soap in the bath room - you need to ask for that. Corridors are not clean(i saw vomit also)...but it's okay hotel as it's near to Disneyland. Wifi signal was very weak...we never got consistent wifi.

Summary Heading: Very low budget not worth the cost, smelled like old...
Summary: Very low budget not worth the cost, smelled like old carpet, nap bug's in the bathroom, room look nothing like advertisement. Breakfast suck, they need at least 2 waffle makers for those guess making 10 +waffles. boiled eggs would have been nice if severing meat is not in their budget.
We were visiting Knotts Berry Farm. This hotel is 1.5 miles away. I enjoyed the continental breakfast and the pool. I recommend it!

Arrived at 10:30 a.m. with room previously booked for six nights.  Was told to come back later they would not give the room to someone else.  When we returned we were told we could not check in without payment by credit card.  They would not take a prepaid Visa credit card, they would not take partial payment of a credit/debit card and cash; I offered a week's payment in cash and would be back in the morning with an upgraded debit/credit card.  I had a six year old granddaughter, and two daughters at 11 o'clock at night with nowhere to stay, in a strange city four states away from home.   Gentlemen at the desk didn't seem to care - he stated it was their policy and threatened to call police if i didn't leave.  Nowhere on their web site did I find a policy of "no cash".

The room was dark, and the bed was extremely uncomfortable. I dont think they did

I asked if we would be charged for the extra room any way and he replied no and canceled the extra reservation on the spot. The rooms were spotless- and smelled clean and fresh. The pool area was great and my guys enjoyed it while the hubby and I enjoyed the Jacuzzi. It was really quiet in the evening. They serve a nice continental breakfast  (including 2 different types of juices) with waffles every day much to the happiness of my guys. Whenever we passed staff in the hallway, they always acknowledged us with a smile and greeting. When it was time to check out the lady who helped me was very sweet and pleasant. It

Summary Heading: A great place for a night or two.
Summary: Clean room, big and spacious. The staff members are friendly and work fast to accommodate their guest. I will definitely recommend this place.

My fiancé and I were originally booked to stay 3 nights at the Buena Park location but we left after the the first night. We stayed in a room toward the back hotel building where there was a lumberyard outside 😕. When got the the room the hallway smelled like marijuana. Then inside there were dusty cobwebs hanging from the popcorn ceiling. The walls were dirty and the bathroom was small and unkempt. The smallest toilet we ever saw and my fiancé saw a long hair in the tub along with an uninvited guest, a spider. Oh yeah, and there was mold on the ceiling above the sink. We told the front desk about it and she was completely unphased by it. The bed and pillows were terrible. The "pillows" we're super lumpy and felt like they stuffed balled up socks in a pillowcase and passed it

Very upscale compared to other hotels. Clean ,quiet, & affortable. No problems what so ever with noise from other guest. Roomy for my children & the breakfast was awsome! Couldn't ask for anything more! Thanks Howard Johnson.....

I went here with my family to visit knotts berry farm and disneyland. All I can say all the employees here are really nice! The rooms are really nice, spacious and super clean/organize as well! I will definitely come back here to check in!   Breakfast was really good rather than the other place, it is continental breakfast but what I like about it is they do serve fresh waffle! Kids love fresh waffle they enjoyed making their own waffle. Breakfast area is really clean and organize, employee always replenish the food and check every now and then to see if everythings okay.   Housekeeping are very nice as well! I can't say anything bad about them. Very kind, good job when it comes on cleaning and giving room service!   Parking there's a lot of parking space for everyone. The place

The room was relatively clean. The bathroom light/fan was setup on an auto on sensor and it would come on by itself and be on all night. The breakfast was just so so, but they had make your own waffles. The front desk staff didn't even inquire how my stay was at checkout. The jacuzzi was broken. The property grounds are not very well maintained.

This is our second stay here at Buena Park Howard Johnson, and it has been a great stay. rooms were big and very clean. the front desk staff was also nice enough to give us adjoining rooms and on the 1st floor, the breakfast was very good they have waffle machines. Housekeeping did a great job. we will definitely stay here again.

We check in, the lobby is nice and management very friendly. Now it begins. We get to our door the keycard lights it up green, after about 7 trys door finally opens. The second key did the same. Come in and sit on the edge of the bed hear a big pop and felt like I was sliding off. Then we go to use the shower and it was so plugged up barely any water came out. My husbaand got some of the calcium deposits out so at least we could get wet!!! Towels were tiny and looked dirty. Then we go down for continental breakfast ha ha joke, no juice, no fruit.... Just dont stay here, very disappointed
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay. My sincere apologies for the mix up during your check in with the key. We have a big goal: to provide great guest service and keep everything sparkly and clean, while we’re at it. I’m so sorry we fell short of your expectations. On the room that you requested to have maintenance fix something, we did go to try to resolve the issues but the room had a DND sign so we couldn't go inside, all of the things you mentioned where inspected after you checked out, and it all seemed fine everything was working properly, although we did find one big hole in the wall and another one in the corner of the wall? and let me assure you that i personally inspect rooms before renting and those two large wholes where not there before you received the rooms, but that's besides the point.   Sincerely, Richard

Summary: We had to change 2 non-smoking rooms on entry because smelled like smoke; one of these also had feces of some kind behind the chair. Other than that the 18 of us did fine here; good value. The breakfast was served on time and very edible.

My mistake to assume all wyndham properties are well maintained. The room we got (213) was dirty & smelled of old carpet. The paint job in the bathroom was obviously done in a rush and in patches. The corners and edges of the bathroom sink was brown. There was a piece of dried toilet paper stuck  in the back of the hotel door. I had to cut our stay short to move to another hotel. Not staying here again. Sorry.

Summary Heading: Bed bugs and broken hot tub
